  > python -m glad --out-path=glad --api="gl:core=3.3" c --header-only

Using an early version of glad2 (https://github.com/Dav1dde/glad/tree/glad2) (Commit: https://github.com/Dav1dde/glad/commit/5976d9b629980ee5155408a9403259404e2328f0)
